attributes.action: Bring In The Troops To Sort The Riots Out....We Want Our City Back
attributes.additional_details:
I'm sure you'll all agree the riots have gone way too far by now and although i'm sure the police have a very hard job fact is they're massively out numbered and so i along with others feel the only way to gain control is to bring in the troops, GET THE ARMY IN TO HELP!  I can bet they'll gain control of the situation.....and justice should be served to anyone involved.

Anyone who agrees sign your names if we get 100,000 people this will most likely be looked at in the houses of commons immediately.
